intro.title: Welcome to Subtraction!
intro.narration: Hello, friends! Today, we're going to learn about subtraction using a fun example: 5 minus 2. Are you ready to explore the world of numbers with me?

explanation.title: Understanding Subtraction
explanation.narration: Subtraction means taking away. When we say 5 minus 2, we start with 5 apples. If we take away 2 apples, how many apples do we have left? Let's count together! 5 apples, take away 2, leaves us with 3 apples. So, 5 minus 2 equals 3!

practice_mcq.title: Let's Practice Together!
practice_mcq.question: What is 5 minus 2?
practice_mcq.explanation: That's right! 5 minus 2 equals 3. Great job! Keep practicing, and you'll be a subtraction pro!

summary.title: Great Job Today!
summary.narration: Wow, you did amazing today learning about subtraction! Remember, subtraction is all about taking away. Next time you see numbers, think about how you can subtract them. See you next time!
